summary.span: 表示一系列連接的直線和曲線。

span.span: Represents a series of connected lines and curves.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式會使用路徑來繪製圖案的外框、 填滿的形狀，內部和建立裁剪區域。Applications use paths to draw outlines of shapes, fill the interiors of shapes, and create clipping regions. 圖形引擎會維護在全局座標空間中的路徑中的幾何形狀的座標。The graphics engine maintains the coordinates of geometric shapes in a path in world coordinate space. 路徑可能會包含任意數目的圖形 （子路徑）。A path may be composed of any number of figures (subpaths). 每一個圖形被組成一系列連接的直線和曲線或基本的幾何圖形。Each figure is either composed of a sequence of connected lines and curves or a geometric shape primitive. 圖表的起點是連接的直線和曲線序列中的第一個點。The starting point of a figure is the first point in the sequence of connected lines and curves. 結束點則是序列中的最後一個點。The ending point is the last point in the sequence. 基本規格會定義基本的幾何圖形的開始和結束點。The starting and ending points of a geometric shape primitive are defined by the primitive specification. 圖，其中包含一系列連接的直線和曲線 （其開始和結束點可能是同一點） 是開放的圖表，除非它明確關閉。A figure that consists of a sequence of connected lines and curves (whose starting and ending points may be coincident) is an open figure, unless it is closed explicitly. 圖可以明確地關閉使用方法，它會關閉目前的圖形從結束點的一條線連接的起始點。A figure can be closed explicitly, by using the method, which closes the current figure by connecting a line from the ending point to the starting point. 幾何的圖形基本項目所組成的圖形是封閉的圖表。A figure that consists of a geometric shape primitive is a closed figure. 基於的填滿和裁剪 (例如，如果路徑使用呈現)，為所有開啟數據都將從圖中的第一個點這一行新增至其最後一個點已關閉。For purposes of filling and clipping (for example, if a path is rendered using ), all open figures are closed by adding a line from the figure's first point to its last point. 建立路徑時，或在關閉圖表時，隱含地啟動新的圖形。A new figure is implicitly started when a path is created or when a figure is closed. 新的圖形時，會明確地建立呼叫方法。A new figure is explicitly created when the method is called. 當基本的幾何圖形加入至路徑時，它會加入包含幾何圖形，圖形，並也會隱含地開始新的圖形。When a geometric shape primitive is added to a path, it adds a figure containing the geometric shape, and also implicitly starts a new figure. 因此，總是有目前的圖形路徑中。Consequently, there is always a current figure in a path. 時的直線和曲線加入至路徑中，視需要以連接至新的線條和曲線來形成一系列連接的直線和曲線的起始點的結束點目前的圖形方式加入隱含的行。When lines and curves are added to a path, an implicit line is added as needed to connect the ending point of the current figure to the starting point of the new lines and curves to form a sequence of connected lines and curves. 圖都有說明如何追蹤直線和曲線線段的起始點與結束點之間的方向。A figure has a direction that describes how line and curve segments are traced between the starting point and the ending point. 方向定義的直線和曲線加入至圖形，或基本的幾何圖形所定義的順序。The direction is defined in the order that lines and curves are added to a figure, or is defined by the geometric shape primitive. 方向用來判斷裁剪及填滿的路徑內部。The direction is used in determining the path interiors for clipping and fill.

summary.span: 將橢圓弧形附加到目前的圖形。

span.span: Appends an elliptical arc to the current figure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果先前的線條或曲線圖中的，則會新增一行開頭弧線的連接上一個區段的端點。If there are previous lines or curves in the figure, a line is added to connect the endpoint of the previous segment to the beginning of the arc. 弧線被沿著受限於指定的矩形橢圓形的周邊。The arc is traced along the perimeter of the ellipse bounded by the specified rectangle. 開始角度的度數的數目 （在 0 度角） 橢圓形的 x 軸順時針測量取決於弧形的開始點。The starting point of the arc is determined by measuring clockwise from the x-axis of the ellipse (at the 0-degree angle) by the number of degrees in the start angle. 端點是同樣位於中掃掠角度度數的起始點的順時針測量。The endpoint is similarly located by measuring clockwise from the starting point by the number of degrees in the sweep angle. 如果大於 360 度或小於-360 度的掃掠角度，則分別由 360 度或-360 度清理弧形。If the sweep angle is greater than 360 degrees or less than -360 degrees, the arc is swept by exactly 360 degrees or -360 degrees, respectively. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`、事件物件。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立的矩形，定義弧形。Creates a rectangle, from which the arc is defined. - 建立路徑， `myPath`。Creates a path, `myPath`. - 定義 180 度的橢圓形弧線的從 0 度跨越到 180 度，並將它附加到路徑。Defines a 180-degree elliptical arc that sweeps from 0 degrees to 180 degrees and appends it to a path. - 繪製到螢幕的路徑。Draws the path to screen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/VB/form1.vb#1)]

span.span: Adds a sequence of connected cubic Bézier curves to the current figure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `points`參數會指定端點的陣列，並已連線的曲線的控制點。The `points` parameter specifies an array of endpoints and control points of the connected curves. 曲線的第一個從第一個點建構中的第四個點`points`作為控點使用的第二個和第三個點的陣列。The first curve is constructed from the first point to the fourth point in the `points` array by using the second and third points as control points. 除了先前的曲線的端點，每個後續的曲線，序列中需要剛好三個的更多點： 在序列中的下面兩個點控點，而且第三個新增的曲線的端點。In addition to the endpoint of the previous curve, each subsequent curve in the sequence needs exactly three more points: the next two points in the sequence are control points, and the third is the endpoint for the added curve. 如果先前的線條或曲線圖中的，則會新增一行至先前的區段中的端點連接至序列中第三次方曲線的起點。If there are previous lines or curves in the figure, a line is added to connect the endpoint of the previous segment to the starting point of the first cubic curve in the sequence. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`、事件物件。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立陣列的七個點 （代表兩個連接的貝茲曲線）。Creates an array of seven points (representing two connected Bézier curves). - 建立路徑，並將一連串的貝茲曲線的點加入路徑。Creates a path and adds the series of Bézier curve points to the path. - 繪製到螢幕的路徑。Draws the path to screen. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果有需要使用者必須保留原始的點。The user must keep the original points if they are needed. 在內部的原始點轉換成三次方貝茲控點，因此沒有任何機制可用於傳回原始的點。The original points are converted to cubic Bézier control points internally, therefore there is no mechanism for returning the original points. 如果第一個點和中的最後一個點`points`陣列不是相同的點，該曲線會關閉連接這些兩個點。If the first point and the last point in the `points` array are not the same point, the curve is closed by connecting these two points. 無法為此方法中，設定張力值和預設值相當於 0.5。The tension value cannot be set for this method, and defaults to a value equivalent to 0.5. ## Examples 如需範例，請參閱 。For an example, see .

param.span: 值，指定曲線在控制點之間彎曲的數量。

summary.span: 將曲線加入目前的圖形。

span.span: Adds a spline curve to the current figure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果有需要使用者必須保留原始的點。The user must keep the original points if they are needed. 在內部的原始點轉換成三次方貝茲控點，因此沒有任何機制可用於傳回原始的點。The original points are converted to cubic Bézier control points internally, therefore there is no mechanism for returning the original points. 在所指定之陣列中的點開始的曲線`offset`參數，並包含所指定的點 （區段） 的數目`numberOfSegments`。The curve begins at the point in the array specified by the `offset` parameter and includes the number of points (segments) specified by `numberOfSegments`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`、事件物件。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立四個點 （代表的基本曲線） 的陣列。Creates an array of four points (representing a cardinal spline). - 建立路徑，並使用點的陣列，將曲線加入路徑。Creates a path and using the array of points, adds the curve to the path. - 繪製到螢幕的路徑。Draws the path to the screen. 請注意，雖然陣列會包含四個點，只有三個區段，這是要呼叫的第三個引數中指定的數字。Notice that while the array holds four points, there are only three segments, which is the number specified in the third argument of the call to . remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果先前的線條或曲線圖中的，則會新增一行將上一個區段的起點的線條端點。If there are previous lines or curves in the figure, a line is added to connect the endpoint of the previous segment the starting point of the line. `points`參數會指定端點的陣列。The `points` parameter specifies an array of endpoints. 前兩個指定的第一行。The first two specify the first line. 每個額外的點指定的線段的起點是在上一行的端點的端點。Each additional point specifies the endpoint of a line segment whose starting point is the endpoint of the previous line. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`、事件物件。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立描述三角形的四個點的陣列。Creates an array of four points that describe a triangle. - 建立路徑，並將新增的行陣列。Creates a path and adds the array of lines. - 繪製到螢幕的路徑。Draws the path to screen. 請注意，每一行的第一個點之後使用前一個點的起始點和新的點做為端點。Notice that each line after the first point uses the previous point as the starting point and the new point as the endpoint. remarks.format: ## Remarks 部分的外框的橢圓形和兩條放射線交集部分的外框的端點定義派形。The pie shape is defined by a partial outline of an ellipse and the two radial lines that intersect the endpoints of the partial outline. 在開始部分的外框`startAngle`（從 x 軸順時針方向測量），並於結束`startAngle` + `sweepAngle`。The partial outline begins at `startAngle` (measured clockwise from the x-axis) and ends at `startAngle` + `sweepAngle`. ## Examples 如需範例，請參閱 。For an example, see .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`、事件物件。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立圖形的路徑和轉移矩陣。Creates a graphics path and a translation matrix. - 將使用四個點的路徑中的曲線。Adds a curve to the path using four points. - 路徑 （曲線） 繪製到螢幕，並使用黑色的畫筆。Draws the path (curve) to the screen, using a black pen. - 移位的曲線下 10 個像素，並將它簡化。Shifts the curve down 10 pixels and flattens it. - 繪製曲線至畫面使用，就會有紅色的畫筆。Draws the curve to the screen using, a red pen. 請注意，紅色曲線已壓平合併連接點的線條。Notice that the red curve has flattened lines connecting the points. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#19](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#19)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#19](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/CS/form1.cs#19)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#19](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/VB/form1.vb#19)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回週框矩形的大小會受到的端點、 畫筆寬度和畫筆斜接限制，類型，並因此會產生 「 鬆散 「 調整成一繫結路徑。The size of the returned bounding rectangle is influenced by the type of end caps, pen width, and pen miter limit, and therefore produces a "loose fit" to the bounded path. 近似的公式是： 初始周框根據畫筆寬度膨脹，與此結果會乘以斜接限制，再加上一些其他的邊界來考慮端點。The approximate formula is: the initial bounding rectangle is inflated by pen width, and this result is multiplied by the miter limit, plus some additional margin to allow for end caps. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`、事件物件。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立圖形路徑。Creates a graphics path. - 將橢圓形 （圓形），並將它繪製到螢幕。Adds an ellipse (circle) to it and draws it to the screen. - 擷取週框圓形，藉由呼叫，並將矩形繪製到螢幕。Retrieves the bounding rectangle for the circle with a call to and draws the rectangle to the screen. - 建立第二個的圖形路徑。Creates a second graphics path. - 新增圓形，並將擴展寬度為 10 的路徑。Adds a circle and widens the path to a width of 10. - 繪製到螢幕的路徑。Draws the path to the screen. - 擷取第二個圓形的周框矩形。Retrieves the bounding rectangle for the second circle. - 繪製到螢幕的周框。Draws the bounding rectangle to the screen. - 在對話方塊中顯示的矩形大小。Displays the rectangle size in a dialog box. 請注意，在右側的周框 （以額外的線條寬度的帳戶）。Notice that the bounding rectangle on the right is larger (to account for the extra width of the line). [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#20](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#20)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/CS/form1.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/VB/form1.vb#20)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所傳回的位元組陣列屬性指定之路徑中的點類型和資料點的旗標。The array of bytes returned by the property specifies point types and flags for the data points in a path. 每個點，位元 0 至 2 表示資料點，型別，位元 3 到 7 保存一組指定的點屬性的旗標。For each point, bits 0 through 2 indicate the type of a point, and bits 3 through 7 hold a set of flags that specify the attributes of a point. 下表顯示可能的值和其意義。The following table shows possible values and their meanings. |值Value|意義Meaning| |-----------|-------------| |00|表示的點是圖形的開始。Indicates that the point is the start of a figure.| |11|表示點線的兩個端點的其中一個。Indicates that the point is one of the two endpoints of a line.| |33|表示點的三次方貝茲曲線的端點或控制點。Indicates that the point is an endpoint or control point of a cubic Bézier spline.| |0x70x7|遮罩除了三個低序位位元，這表示的 point 類型的所有位元。Masks all bits except for the three low-order bits, which indicate the point type.| |0x200x20|指定點的標記。Specifies that the point is a marker.| |0x800x80|指定點是在已關閉的子路徑 （圖） 中的最後一個點。Specifies that the point is the last point in a closed subpath (figure).|

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`、事件物件。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立路徑。Creates a path. - 將數個基本項目加入至它。Adds several primitives to it. - 繪製到螢幕的路徑的點陣列。Draws the path's points array to the screen. - 路徑重設為空白的狀態。Resets the path to an empty state. - （若有的話），請重新擷取點陣列。Re-acquires the points array (if it exists). - 繪製到螢幕的陣列。Draws the array to the screen. 請注意它找到沒有重設呼叫後的陣列。Notice that it finds no array following the reset call. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可以用來分隔區段的路徑的路徑上建立標記。This method creates a marker on the path that can be used to separate sections of the path. 您可以接著使用來逐一查看在路徑中標記的方法。You can then use the methods to iterate through the markers in the path. 標記用來分隔的子路徑的群組。Markers are used to separate groups of subpaths. 可包含一個或多個子路徑中的兩個標記之間。One or more subpaths can be contained between two markers in the path. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`、事件物件。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 程式碼會建立路徑和將數個基本項目加入至標記，以分隔的路徑，並繪製到螢幕的路徑。The code creates a path and adds several primitives to the path separated by markers, and draws the path to the screen. summary.span: 不關閉目前的圖形而開始新圖形。

span.span: Starts a new figure without closing the current figure.

summary.span: 所有後續加入至路徑的點會加入至這個新圖形。

span.span: All subsequent points added to the path are added to this new figure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果有需要使用者必須保留原始的點。The user must keep the original points if they are needed. 在內部的原始點轉換成三次方貝茲控點，因此沒有任何機制可用於傳回原始的點。The original points are converted to cubic Bézier control points internally, therefore there is no mechanism for returning the original points. 這個方法會啟動新的子路徑的路徑中。This method starts a new subpath in the path. 路徑可讓您分隔成區段的路徑並使用來逐一查看子路徑的類別。Subpaths allow you to separate a path into sections and use the class to iterate through the subpaths. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`、事件物件。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立路徑。Creates a path. - 將兩組數字。Adds two sets of figures. 第一組數字會合併兩個圖形中的四個基本項目。The first set of figures combines four primitives into two figures. 第二組數字合併相同的四個基本項目 （不同之處在於它們會在 y 軸的位移） 的三張圖。The second set of figures combines the same four primitives (except that they are offset in the y-axis) into three figures. - 繪製到螢幕的所有數字。Draws all the figures to the screen. 請注意的差異，這兩組數字之間的外觀。Notice the difference in the appearance between the two sets of figures. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#27](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#27)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#27](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/CS/form1.cs#27)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#27](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/VB/form1.vb#27)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`、事件物件。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立路徑，並將矩形加入至路徑。Creates a path and adds a rectangle to the path. - 繪製矩形到以黑色畫面。Draws that rectangle to the screen in black. - 個路徑變形使用透視點彎曲。Warps the path with a perspective warp. - 繪製彎曲的矩形 （路徑） 至畫面中紅色。Draws the warped rectangle (path) to the screen in red. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#29](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#29)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#29](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/CS/form1.cs#29)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#29](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/VB/form1.vb#29)]

span.span: Replaces this path with curves that enclose the area that is filled when this path is drawn by the specified pen.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會建立在此的原始行周圍外的框，與現有的行和新的外框之間的距離相等的寬度呼叫中使用。This method creates an outline around the original lines in this , with a distance between the existing lines and the new outline equal to that of the width of the used in the call to . 如果您想要填滿線條之間的空間必須使用而不是然後。If you want to fill the space between the lines you must use the rather then the . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`、事件物件。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立路徑，並將兩個橢圓形加入路徑。Creates a path and adds two ellipses to the path. - 繪製路徑為黑色。Draws the path in black. - 將擴展路徑。Widens the path. - 繪製紅色的路徑。Draws the path in red. 請注意，第二個的轉譯會使用而不是，且因此轉譯的圖填滿外框。Notice that the second rendering uses instead of , and hence the rendered figure has the outline filled.
